OrgName: Reed Elsevier Technology Services, a division of Reed Elsevier Inc.
activities: Reed Elsevier Technology Services (RETS) was formed to centralize global Information Technology (IT) services for Reed Elsevier and its affiliates and to deliver secure information-driven solutions to business partners and their customers. RETS provides full service data center operations. The organization is responsible for server configuration, system administration and support, storage management, network design and operations, and security (logical and physical).
corpofftitle1: General Counsel Intellectual Property, Privacy and Governance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We adhere to AICPA Generally Accepted Privacy Principles and we also have a self-regulatory privacy program in place that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
